### Read in data

clim_df <- read_table("clim.txt") %>% 
  ### remove quotes in names
  janitor::clean_names()

### Climate data test fxn
```{r}
### Find the avg tmin, tmax, and precip for each month in dataset
clim_avg <- clim_df %>% 
  group_by(month, year) %>% 
  summarize(tmax_avg = mean(tmax_c),
            tmin_avg = mean(tmin_c),
            precip_avg = mean(precip))
```





### Almond test fxn
```{r}

test <- function(min_temp, precip) {
  yield = -0.015*(min_temp) - 0.0046*(min_temp^2) - 0.07*(precip) + 0.0043*(precip^2) + 0.28
  
  return(yield)
}
```
